title: I've updated my Pixel 2 to Android 11 and since updating my phone ringtone is set to 1380??
content: I've updated my Pixel 2 to Android 11 and since updating my phone ringtone is set to 1380. I have tried to change it but it won't change. I have rebooted the phone several times. I am also unable to select custom ringtones.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
